entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Segmentation violation when doing server-side Kerberos authentication on macOS #71463
  • [wasm][debugger] Debugger not working when managed libraries don't have debug symbols. #71456
    7.0.0
  • TarWriter does not throw an error when adding files to an invalid tar archive #71454
  • Improve the Kerberos testing infrastructure #71453
    Future
  • Obfuscate unstable native entry points? #71451
  • BinaryData Method ToObjectFromJson Does Not Properly Handle BOM #71447
  • CoreLibBinder asserts with certain static abstract in interface declarations #71441
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Introduce MonoAotMethodSupportedTypesAttribute for generic methods to prevent unnecessary GSHAREDVT fallbacks in the AOT compiler #71431
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Investigate rewriting Scalar<T> methods so the linker can replace them with stubs #71430
    7.0.0
  • Enhance the NTLM negotiation testing on Linux/macOS #71427
    Future
  • [wasm] broken .locals init #71425
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandler_RemoteServerTest.SendAsync_RequestVersion20_ResponseVersion20 #71418
  • Parallel.ForEachAsync the TaskScheduler and MaxDegreeOfParallelism options interfere with each other #71415
  • Static virtual reabstraction doesn't seem to work #71414
    7.0.0
  • Testing GC Heap Counts with Containers #71413

Closed

  • The WriteOnceBlock<T> behaves unexpectedly with AsObservable #70481
    Future
  • `fgMorphMultiregStructArg` does not check layout compatibility when morphing stack args to `FIELD_LIST` #65936
    7.0.0
  • `ArgsComplete` still doesn't spill all non-morphable multi-reg nodes #71375
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT under CoreCLR debug experience #70719
  • More informational error message when parsing number #65834
    Future
  • Generate "trimmed" assembly using NativeAOT #71363
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Pass ArrayPool<char> to System.Text.Json #71423
  • [API Proposal]: Add AllBitsSet to the IBinaryNumber Interface #69676
    7.0.0
  • [UWP] HttpClientHandler - Digest Authentication Broken on Windows 10 PC #42301
    Future
  • [Feature Request]: Diagnostics for processor count #56143
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Threading.Channels.Tests.BoundedChannelTests.ManyProducerConsumer_ConcurrentReadWrite_WithBufferedCapacity_Success - NullReferenceException #71035
  • [API Proposal]: `System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Heif` and `Webp`. #70422
    7.0.0
  • Alternative of Windows Kernel32 API in .NET 6 Linux/MacOS platform #71437
  • [wasm][windows] v8 doesn't seem to exit sometimes causing helix test run to time out #64227
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.IsolatedStorage.HelperTests.GetDataDirectory fails on Android #36836
    7.0.0
  • Fix AbortTest.Abort_ConnectAndAbort_ThrowsWebSocketExceptionWithmessage on NodeJS #63673
    7.0.0
  • Reusing SmtpClient hangs in net50 #49340
    Future
  • typeof(Queryable).GetMethods() returns the result in different order for .NET 5 and .NET 6 #71422
  • [libraries-pgo] arm64 failure in System.Tests.DoubleTests.ParsePatterns #71005
    7.0.0
  • `libnethost.lib` appears to be built with LTCG, making it unusable with non-MSVC toolchains #71056
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Misc fixes for template projects #71468
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Allow specifying the in/ref/out marshaller scenarios for the generator factory #71466
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Move _OOP_find_proc_info to libunwind #71465
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding support to receive evaluationOptions from dap. #71464
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Return receive flags from ReceiveMessageFromAsync on Windows #71462
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Regression test for GitHub issue #71319 #71461
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] InterpToNativeGenerator: use invariant culture when generating C #71460
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Allow UTF-8 BOM in BinaryData When Deserializing #71457
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Delete the zero-offset field sequence map #71455
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Work around for UriFormatException caused by \\?\ prefix in the path #71452
    area-System.Configuration
  • Fixing a typo in copying pdb files #71450
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement new metadata knobs as internal APIs #71449
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix Avx2.cs comments #71448
    community-contribution
  • Use llvm-objcopy for regular and cross builds #71446
  • Enable CA1727: Use PascalCase for named placeholders #71444
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fix some tests regressed by the aggressive reflection metadata trimming work #71440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid introducing GT_NULLCHECK in gtTryRemoveBoxUpstreamEffects #71439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce System.Runtime.TieredPGO knob #71438
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [debugger] Fix debugging on Mac and iOS #71436
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] legacy AOT profiler fixups #71434
    area-Build-mono
  • Bring over distributed transactions support for Windows #71433
    area-System.Transactions
  • Implement new QuicException proposal #71432
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • add basic support for SNI different than URI in H3 #71428
    area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Re-create profile data on profile-use-only mode #71420
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use u8 string in CultureNames #71417
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Recognize the stateful marshaller shape #71355
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Delete `fgMorphGetStructAddr` #71078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable hot/cold splitting of EH funclets #71236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete dead code #71351
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Check layout compatibility before morphing `OBJ(ADDR(LCL_VAR))` into a list of promoted fields #71348
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on ARM64 #71328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Spill non-morphable split args on non-ARM targets #71380
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix -cmakeargs option handling in build.sh #70901
    community-contribution
  • Adding AllBitsSet to IBinaryNumber Interface #71356
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • MonoAOTCompilerTask: Don't check for temp file if cache is disabled #71411
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Optimize `HashCode.AddBytes` for inputs larger than 16 bytes. #70095
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Disable failing graphics tests on windows 7 #71151
    area-System.Drawing
  • Add ProcessorCount Event to RuntimeEventSource #65581
    area-System.Diagnostics, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Remove unused field in Exception.Mono #71202
  • Add `System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Heif` and `Webp`. #71227
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Disable ConnectWithRevocation_StapledOcsp on RHEL and CentOS 7 #71397
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Remove stale CA1419 suppressions #71406
  • #36836 enable test on android #71371
    area-System.IO
  • [wasm] Drop active issue on fixed NodeJS test #71421
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fix OSX thread_set_state calls in CONTEXT_SetThreadContextOnPort #71410
    os-mac-os-x, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix leaking mach ports & memory after task_threads() #70338
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix SmtpClient reuse with SendAsync #70046
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Improve allocations in NegotiateStreamPal #71280
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update rollback link for Maui workload install #71403
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix loading NPM packages on NodeJS tests #71377
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Disable HANDLER_ENTRY_MUST_BE_IN_HOT_SECTION #71273
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move macOS remote unwinding to libunwind directory #69720
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Re-enable automatic gc safe transitions in threaded wasm mode #71229
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, area-Threading-mono
  • JIT: fix double reporting of some GC frame slots #71245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Avoid a linear search in the GENERICPARAMCONSTRAINT table, its… #71349
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Use GenericArraySortHelper<T> on mono as well. #71325
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Disable LTCG when building libnethost.lib for Windows. #71089
    area-Host, community-contribution, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Add support for GetPinnableReference for the new marshaller shapes #71412
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Update all internal marshallers that don't require pinning support to the new model #71470
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm-mt] Add MessageChannel between browser thread and new pthreads #70908
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] thread suspension on Unix #71187
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Preparation for public API in System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript #71332
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • S.S.C.Cose: Add new MultiSign APIs and address API review feedback on existing ones #71390
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • NonBacktracking locking fixes and cleanup #71234
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Speed up Convert.ToBase64String() #69884
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable AES encryption on Browser WASM #70915
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [API Implementation]: Add `Order` and `OrderDescending` to `Enumerable` and `Queryable` #70525
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add an Azure NPM registry #71393
    area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize `System.Reflection.Metadata.ByteSequenceComparer`. #70047
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - fixes for tests failing on CI #70704
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Mono] Fix all remaining C4018 warnings and enable the check during build #71269
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Cross module take3 #71271
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix crossgen2 version resilience test #71357
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Implement HttpProtocolException for HTTP/2 #71345
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [custom_attrs] Use the image's ALC instead of the default one (#68266) #70346
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] test case for broken .locals init #71387
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add CET pipeline #71223
  • Implement Tar async APIs #70574
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Morph tree before making an unused value for cse hoisting #71407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve interoperability of NTLM encryption/decryption and authentication #71373
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • PipeReaderStream.ReadInternal throws AggregateException unexpectedly #70248
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • [mono][eventpipe] Write primitive types and UTF-16 strings in little endian order #68648
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix long latencies in `ReaderWriterLockSlim` lock operations due to `Sleep(1)` #70165
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Experiment light self contained test runner(no reflection/comm stack) #71305
    community-contribution
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Add a config to MIBC format #71359
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Blazor Hybrid iOS & Mac Catalyst Performance Profiling #68685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add missing Oracle RIDs #66684
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Introduce AOT friendly version of ToLogFont and FromLogFont #70224
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix building with clang 14 #69990
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn. #70911
  • Refactoring IShiftOperators to take a `TOther` #71405
    area-System.Numerics, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink loop with stackalloc #69335
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Reflection.Metadata.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #69999
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Exclude root folder's .md files as well from triggering CI #71404
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix some System.Net.Security tests #71385
    area-System.Net.Security
  • #71252 disable Atan2PiTest on Android x86 #71382
    os-android, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Make the archives created on Unix have the read permissions by default #70735
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Consolidate Newtonsoft versions #71402
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix race condition between GCInfo and Rundown #70609
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Do not spill "mis-sized" struct args passed on stack #71399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Finds logger field in related types #71308
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Fix: using default value for nullable enum parameter throws ArgumentException #71388
    area-System.Reflection

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Redesign the hot cold mapping data structure to allow fast lookup #1903

PullRequests

Merged

  • Generated the cold code in the proper session #1916

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `TransformAppSettings` in the publication tasks to update more than only connection strings #26373
  • Publishing native aot applications no longer create pdb files #26349
    7.0.1xx
  • Decorator pattern for functions in .NET #26339
  • Provide a way for easily including localized text resources into a build #26337
  • Dotnet Watch Hot-Reload should restart on changes to the Entrypoint #26336

Closed

  • Allow dotnet workload list to return version and checksum of packages #24340
    6.0.4xx
  • Add Fractions<T> to System.Numerics #25874
  • undefined symbol: _ZTTNSt7__cxx1118basic_stringstreamIcSt11char_traitsIcESaIcEEE, version GLIBCXX_3.4.21 #26260

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow dotnet workload update print-download-link-only to use fallback and work with prior SDK versions #26369
    Area-Workloads
  • Simplify caching logic to not try and retain caches between supression #26367
  • Support wwwroot/.well-known in web/Razor publish output #26366
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26359
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce System.Runtime.TieredPGO knob #26350
  • Update the hardcoded to the current framework #26334

Merged

  • [6.0.400] Display manifest version inside of workload list #26362
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update to the shipped 6.0.6 runtime. #26361
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support workload pack groups for repair, download, and show URL operations #25829
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26335
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Pick Template Callback to 7.0.100-preview6 #26327

Updated

  • Make the ImplicitUsings feature minimally define each imported namespace #25225
    Area-NetSDK
  • [gh-23135] use parent path of manifest file path as rootConfigDirectory #24935
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Don't retarget testhost #25940
  • Allow dotnet workload update print-download-link-only to work with when update available in newer feature band #25669
    Area-Workloads
  • Display manifest version inside of workload list #26326
    Area-Infrastructure
  • MSBuild server V2 #26104
    Area-CLI
  • Add property builder helper #23730
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change linker to trim everything by default in 7.0 #26246
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix dotnet sln add for older 4.7.2 projects wrong configuration #26329
    Area-Infrastructure
  • For build-from-source builds of .NET, opt-out of Microsoft telemetry #25935
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "utf8 string literals" #184
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: ReadOnlySpan initialization from static data #5295

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix typos in low level struct improvements #6250

Updated

  • ref fields updates #6249

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0040: Accessibility modifiers required should not be reported on file types #62259
    17.4
  • Public API for "file types" #62254
    17.4
  • Allow a ref field to refer to a ref struct type #62243
    Compiler.Next
  • Switch expression using pattern matching on floating point values reports wrong result for double.Nan #62241
  • Severe ConditionalWeakTable contention observed on TryParseConversionOperatorDeclaration failure path #62238
    17.3
  • Inheritance margin not working for interactive workspace #62229
  • Compiler asserting in CSharpSemanticModel.GetImportScopesCore #62227
    17.4

Closed

  • IDE should highlight required members when in an initializer #61534
  • JsonSourceGenerator throwing exceptions after edit removing attribute #57455
    17.3
  • Promote CompletionList.ItemsList to public API #61971
  • StackOverflow in Test_Windows_CoreClr_Release CI #62222
  • Editorconfig UI failing to do anything #62232
  • Allow `EmitCompilerGeneratedFiles` to specify specific generators #56113
    17.3
  • RegisterImplementationSourceOutput should work with partial methods #56390
    17.3
  • Integration tests should clearly indicate "failure to save" #62109
    17.3
  • Add missing binaries for version stamping by compiler #57107
    17.3
  • Unreachable code CodeFixProvider crashes when FixAll is applied #61837
    17.3
  • CSharpRemoveUnreachableCodeCodeFixProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #61810
  • Restrict values that trigger "Convert to Utf-8 string" analyzer #62207

PullRequests

Created

  • Give an error when a file type is used in a global using static #62258
    Area-Compilers
  • When we're removing the last project, fire SolutionRemoved #62257
    Area-IDE
  • Delete some dead code in AbstractCreateServicesOnTextViewConnection #62256
    Area-IDE
  • faster git checkout #62255
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Run the 'use null prop' analyzer/fixer on roslyn #62253
    Area-IDE
  • Expand "use null propagation" feature to support additional common cases. #62250
    Area-IDE
  • Fix a race in CachingDictionary. #62248
    Area-Compilers
  • Theme The "Generate Overrides" Dialog #62244
    Area-IDE
  • Rules missing documentation #62242
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Perform a lookahead rather than a parsing attempt in order to determine if current token starts a conversion operator declaration. #62240
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Add ErrorFacts.IsBuildOnlyDiagnostic to ensure error list de-duping f… #62237
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Fix GetDescription and GetChange for reference-based completion providers #62231
    Area-IDE
  • Issue/38102 #62226
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #62252
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62247
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #62251
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #62245
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Port "Adjust caching logic when a NodeStateTable is empty" to 17.3 #62249
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62246
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Improve the experience of completion around required members #62065
    Area-IDE, Next
  • State Machine EnC follow-up #62170
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • File types emit #61646
    Area-Compilers
  • Adjust caching logic when a `NodeStateTable` is empty #62068
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1851867 #62234
  • Promote CompletionList.ItemsList to public API #61869
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #62164
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Reuse incremental states from prior runs if they are unchanged #62116
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Use new analyzer/fixer in roslyn #62202
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use BackgroundWorkIndicator for Rename Command Handler #61906
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Disallow ref field to ref struct #62186
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, 17.3
  • A couple of fixups for the Utf-8 string literal code fix and analyzer #62230
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Verify files are saved after a save operation #62117
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix invalid cast when removing unreachable code in top-level programs #61830
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62235
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62236
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Cherry-pick 62053 to release/dev17.3 #62220
    Area-IDE
  • insert release/dev17.3 branch to vs main #62233
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • EnC: Log more info to in-memory buffer to simplify dump analysis #62070
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Make sure spans are valid before trying to get exception regions #62178
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62223
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62228
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify symbol key creation/resolution for named types #62216
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Snap release/dev17.4 to main #62196
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Snap main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62194

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62263
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62262
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #62261
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • [WIP] improve test partitioning #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Allow BatchNodes to reuse prior computed arrays if they would generate hte same value #62169
    Area-Compilers
  • Provide parse options to the language service more quickly #60855
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle possible null symbols in `getAttributeTarget` #62137
    Area-Compilers
  • Add two more integration tests for InheritanceMargin #62217
    Area-IDE
  • Synch handlers with fix #62209
    Area-IDE
  • Fix project based CompletionProvider #61976
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • Pool arrays in the incremental generator #62132
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Use constant interpolated string analyzer #51705
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • Highlight the search term in the options page #61301
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for file-types in SymbolKey. #62218
    Area-IDE
  • Use the prior cached state for the Razor generator in later runs #62219
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to set SignInScheme in an application using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect on multiple IDPs #42493
    Discussions
  • Improve route pattern related errors when working with route groups #42491
  • WebTransport API #42490
  • Allow configuring W3CLogging to write to stdout #42489
    .NET 8 Planning

entry.content:
